contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 14, 1935 D Wigan Contest
Wigan Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wigan Contest wigan-contest
Mesnes Park, Wigan, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £6, 3rd £4, 4th £2, 5th £1. March contest - 1st(£3) Standfast Works, 2nd(£2) Skelmersdale Temperance, 3rd (£1) Pemberton Old. Contest promoted on behalf of Wigan Infirmary. 12 bands competed.
Dec. 28, 2014, 7:10 a.m. Dec. 28, 2014, 7:21 a.m.
1 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band James Fairhurst
2 Skelmersdale Prize Band Fred Astley
3 Standfast Works Arthur Brownbill
4 Sutton Manor Colliery J. Gaskell
5 Skelmersdale Old Richard Farrington
Unknown Result Birkenhead Corporation Transport J. H. Strangman
Unknown Result Coppull Subscription Band William Haydock
Unknown Result Pemberton Temperance J. J. Beddard
Unknown Result Hindley P. Turton
Unknown Result Earlestown Viaduct C. S. Jones
Unknown Result Lower Ince Temperance Richard Hooper
Unknown Result Golborne Band J. W. Naylor
